# Sinch MCP Server â€” Developer Preview [![Latest Release](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@sinch/mcp?label=%40sinch%2Fmcp&labelColor=FFC658)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@sinch/mcp) This repository contains the source code for the Sinch MCP server, which provides a set of tools to interact with the Sinch APIs. This README focuses on using the MCP server with the [Claude Desktop](https://claude.ai/download) client, but it can also be used with any other MCP client. ## Tools Overview Here is the list of tools available in the MCP server (all the phone numbers must be provided in E.164 format, e.g., `+33612345678` for France). ### Conversation Tools | Tool | Description | Tags | |------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------| | **send-text-message** | Send a plain text message to a recipient on a supported channel.
